title: Run your own high-end cloud gaming service on EC2
description:
NOTE: This article has been superseded by my more recent one here

How to use EC2 GPU machines + Steam In-Home Streaming + a VPN to play AAA titles on a shitty laptop

You might have tried a service like the now defunct OnLive. Though personally I’ve played and beat many AAA games on the service, it unfortunately a) had a very limited selection and b) is now gone. I also have a bunch of games on Steam that I’ve played using my eGPU. With the new Macbook though, I won’t be able to continue my low-end-laptop but high-end gaming extra
